pages.text: 53|45|jaung-eulo namseong-gwa yeoseong-eul chang johasa
53|46|bojondoen jeong-aeg-eulo buteola
53|47|hananim-eun jeiui changjoleul yag soghasa
53|48|buwa gippeum-eul jusineun bun-isi myeo
53|49|hananim-eun siliuseu byeol-ui ju nim-isila
53|50|hananim-eun himsen yes adeuui baegseong-eul myeolmangke hago
53|51|samudeu baegseongdo geuleohge hayeo amugeosdo namji anhge hayeoss-eumyeo
53|52|geudeul ijeon-ui saaghago oman haessdeon noaui baegseongdo geuleohge hayeoss nola
53|53|hananim-eun los-ui go-euldeuldo jeon bogsikyeo
53|54|eungbeolloseo geudeul-eul gamssa beolyeoss eudoe
53|55|geulaedo neohuineun junim-ui eunhe e gwanhayeo nonjaenghaneunyo
53|56|ineun yes gyeong-gojadeul-e dwiieo on gyeong-gojala
53|57|ttaega dagaogo iss-eudoe
53|58|hananim oeeneun eoneu nugudo geugeos-eul jejihaji moshalila
53|59|geulaedo neohuineun igeos e daehayeo jolonghago issneunyo
53|60|usdoe ulji anihago
53|61|sigan-eul heosdoei bonaelyeo haneu nyo
53|62|hananimkke buboghago geubun man eul gyeongbaehala
54|1|simpan-ui nal-i gakkawo omae dal i dullo bunlidoedeola
54|2|geudeul-i geu yejeung-eul boassda ha deolado igeos-eun hangsang issneun masul-e bulgwahadago geudeul-eun malhanola
54|3|geudeul-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan chae geudeul ui yogmang-eul ttaleul ppun-ila geuleona modeun-il-eun jijeongdoen sigag-e ileunola
54|4|imi geudeul-eul gyeong-gohan iyagideul i geudeul-ege ileuleoss-eumyeo
54|5|wanseongdoen jihyedo iss-eoss-euna gyeong-go janeun geudeul-ege yuyonghaji moshaessdeola
54|6|geudeul-eul meollihala cheonsaga geu deul-eul geudeul-i silh-eohaneun gos-eulo ho chulhalila
